s571: As General attacking Wu Chu with merit, used as Prime Minister of Zhao, Marquis, two thousand five hundred forty-one households.
s575: Four. Sixth year fourth month ren shen, Marquis Kang Su Jia first year. Seven. Zhong third year, Marquis Yi Lu first year.
s576: Two. Jianyu third year, Marquis Ming first year. Sixteen. Yuanshuo sixth year, Marquis Diao first year. Eleven. Yuanding fifth year, Marquis Diao convicted of tribute gold, state abolished.
s579: As Prime Minister of Zhao Jian De, King Sui rebelled, Jian De did not listen, died in service, son Marquis, one thousand nine hundred seventy households.
s583: Six. Zhong second year fourth month yi si, Marquis Heng first year. Later second year, Marquis Heng committed crime, state abolished.
s587: As Interior Minister of Zhao Wang Shen, King Sui rebelled, Shen did not listen, died in service, son Marquis, one thousand fourteen households.
s591: Five. Zhong second year fourth month yi si, Marquis Wang Kang first year. Three. Later first year, Marquis Shang Shi Chang first year.
s592: Nine. Yuanguang fourth year, Marquis Shang Shi Chang assassinated, state abolished.
s595: As Grand Tutor of Chu Zhao Yi Wu, King Wu rebelled, did not listen, died in service, son Marquis, one thousand forty-five households.
s599: Eight. Zhong second year fourth month yi si, Marquis Zhao Zhou first year.
s600: Twenty-nine. Yuanding fifth year, Marquis Zhou convicted of as Chancellor knowing marquises' tribute gold light, sent to Tribunal, suicide, state abolished.
s603: As Prime Minister of Chu Zhang Shang, King Wu rebelled, Shang did not listen, died in service, son Marquis, one thousand one hundred fourteen households.
s607: Eight. Zhong second year fourth month yi si, Marquis Zhang Dang Ju first year.
s608: Sixteen. Yuanshuo fifth year, Marquis Dang Ju convicted of as Grand Master of Ceremonies not punishing disciple disciples according to real crimes, state abolished.
s611: As Xiongnu king surrendered, Marquis, one thousand five hundred seventeen households.
s615: Seven. Zhong third year eleventh month geng zi, Marquis Zi Jun first year.
s616: Five. Jianyu sixth year, Marquis Zi Jun died, no posterity, state abolished.
s623: Three. Zhong third year twelfth month ding chou, Marquis Ci first year. Sixth year, Ci died, could not succeed to heir.
s627: As Xiongnu king surrendered, Marquis, five thousand five hundred sixty-nine households.
s631: Zhong third year twelfth month ding chou, Marquis Long Qiang first year. Could not succeed Long Qiang.
s633: Later first year fourth month jia chen, Marquis Ze convicted of sending witch Qi Shao Jun to pray and curse, great way without way, state abolished.
s635: As Xiongnu king surrendered, Marquis, seven hundred households.
s639: Seven. Zhong third year twelfth month ding chou, Marquis Wei Xu Lu first year.
s640: Fourteen. Jianyu first year, Marquis Kang Chuo first year. Twenty-two. Yuanshuo third year, Marquis Guang first year.
s641: Eighteen. Later second year, third month ren chen, Marquis Guang convicted of praying and cursing, state abolished.
s647: Six. Zhong third year twelfth month ding chou, Marquis Pu Qing first year. Later second year, Marquis Pu Qing died, no heir.
s651: As Xiongnu king surrendered, Marquis, one thousand one hundred ninety-seven households.
s655: Seven. Zhong third year twelfth month ding chou, Marquis Duan Dai first year.
s656: Seven. Yuanguang second year, Marquis Huai De first year. Two. Yuanguang fourth year, Marquis De died, no posterity, state abolished.
s663: Seven. Zhong third year twelfth month ding chou, Marquis Han Dan first year.
s664: Nine. Yuanguang fourth year, Marquis Han Dan convicted of coming and going without requesting Chang Xin, disrespectful, state abolished.
s667: As Donghu king of Xiongnu surrendered, son of former King Lu Wan of Yan, Marquis, one thousand five hundred households.
s671: Two. Zhong fifth year fourth month ding si, Marquis Jian Ta Fu first year. Three. Later first year, Marquis An Zhong first year.
s672: Eleven. Jianyu first year, Marquis Kang Pian first year. Twenty-five. Yuanguang sixth year, Marquis He first year.
